Functions of the cf module¶

Reading and writing¶

cfdm.read Read fields from netCDF, PP or UM fields files.
cfdm.write Write fields to a netCDF file.

Mathematical operations¶

Comparison¶

cfdm.equals True if and only if two objects are logically equal.

Date-time¶

cfdm.dt Return a date-time variable for a given date and time.

Retrieval and setting of constants¶

cfdm.ATOL The value of absolute tolerance for testing numerically tolerant equality.
cfdm.RTOL The value of relative tolerance for testing numerically tolerant equality.

Miscellaneous¶

cfdm.abspath Return a normalized absolute version of a file name.
cfdm.dirname Return the directory name of a file.
cfdm.environment Return the names and versions of cf-python dependencies.
cfdm.flat Return an iterator over an arbitrarily nested sequence.
cfdm.pathjoin Join two file path components intelligently.
cfdm.relpath Return a relative filepath to a file.
